item.title: Why There Are 2 Predator Movies Coming Out This Year
item.description: Following the unprecedented success of Dan Trachtenberg's Prey, 2025 will see 2 completely different iterations of the Predator universe come to life.

item.title: After The Thunderbolts* Early Reactions, I'm Relieved Marvel Is Embracing The MCU's Best Post-Endgame Character
item.description: Early reactions to Marvel's Thunderbolts* have arrived, and I couldn't be happier that one post-Endgame character is the movie's breakout star.
